scripts.build: tsc && cp -r prisma dist/ && cp -r static dist/
scripts.start:with-migration: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prod:setup && npm start
scripts.render-start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=496 --no-warnings" SKIP_DB_SYNC=true IS_RENDER=true RENDER=true node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=496 --optimize-for-size --gc-interval=100 dist/src/server.js
scripts.render-diagnose-and-start: npm run render-diagnose && npm run render-start
scripts.render-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=496 --no-warnings" SKIP_DB_SYNC=true IS_RENDER=true RENDER=true node --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=496 --optimize-for-size --gc-interval=100 dist/src/server.js
scripts.start-render: npm run render-diagnose && npm run render-start
scripts.render-deploy: npm run db:check && npm run render-start
scripts.neon:check: npm run db:check && echo '✅ 데이터베이스 연결 체크 완료'
scripts.neon:cleanup: npm run db:cleanup && echo '✅ 데이터베이스 연결 정리 완료'
scripts.neon:status: npm run db:connections && echo '✅ 데이터베이스 상태 확인 완료'
scripts.render:deploy: npm run neon:check && npm run render-prod
scripts.render:deploy:with-cleanup: npm run neon:cleanup && npm run render-prod
scripts.db:init-and-seed: npm run db:reset && npm run seed
scripts.db:fresh: prisma migrate reset --force && npm run seed
scripts.dev:with-seed: npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.setup-and-dev: npm run db:prisma:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run seed && npm run dev
scripts.prod:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run db:prisma:generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prod:seed:batch: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BATCH_SIZE=5 BATCH_DELAY=2000 ts-node src/seed/seed.ts
scripts.render:start:optimized: npm run neon:cleanup && concurrently "npm run render-prod" "npm run db:monitor"
scripts.neon:reset: node scripts/fix-db.js reset && echo '✅ 데이터베이스 초기화 완료'
scripts.build:optimized: tsc && cp -r prisma dist/ && cp -r static dist/ && npm run neon:cleanup
scripts.render:deploy:optimized: npm run build:optimized && npm run optimized:start
